ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] new guild and new server?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... When I am in an RP mood.  I deal with it as cousin or friend... or in the case of my necro... Evil stepsister.  As in, my cousin Callista wants to lock me
ygData.messageBody:
> Then add that the High Elf wants the Iksar player to
> quit playing a secondary and come help... Not that
> it isn't possible to counter the effect, just that
> it is hard work.
>
>
> Tszaaz

When I am in an RP mood. I deal with it as cousin or
friend... or in the case of my necro... Evil
stepsister. As in, "my cousin Callista wants to lock
me up in that dark box so she can interact with
greater Norrath for awhile" This to let my guild know
Harmonie is logging off, but Im around if they need me.

=====
Harmonie Moonsong
<Lost Souls of Norrath>
29th Composition in Progress
High Keep, Norrath, Bristlebane server
